activity.title: "Quick Data Display"
activity.description: Quick display of data for debugging purposes.

activity.title: "Default Configuration of the Global Earthquake Explorer"

taskconfig.name: north
taskconfig.value: Welcome to GEE, the Global Earthquake Explorer

taskconfig.name: south
taskconfig.value: Welcome to GEE. GEE contains two types of programs: Exploration Environments, which are designed for open exploration, and Learning Modules, which provide a structured way of learning about a particular topic. Click a button to access the program that you want to use. (For a description of the program, roll over the button.) To return to this page at any moment, click the Welcome tab at the top.

taskconfig.name: Longitudinal and Transverse Wave Learning Module

task.name: Load a Recent Earthquake from SCEPP
Choose Time relative to your Earthquake
Load a Recent Earthquake from SCEPP

taskconfig.name: taskSequence
taskconfig.value: colseisdisplay QuakeFromSCEPP ShowEvents StationsFromSCEPP TimeForEarthquakeSCEPP EditCurrentDataSet

task.name: Zoom In
task.tooltip: Click this button, then use your mouse to click on a seismogram to zoom in on the time scale

task.name: Zoom Out
task.tooltip: Click this button, then use your mouse to click on a seismogram to zoom in on the time scale

task.name: Drag Seismograms
task.tooltip: Click this button, then use your mouse to drag a seismogram left or right by holding down the mouse button

task.name: Reset Zoom!
task.tooltip: Click here to restore the seismogram display to its default zoom

task.name: Clear Display
task.tooltip: Click here to clear all seismograms from your display

task.name: Remove Seismogram
task.tooltip: Click here, then use your mouse to click on individual seismograms to remove them from your display

task.name: Plot Particle Motion
task.tooltip: Click here, then create a particle motion display by clicking on a seismogram

task.name: Tag Pick Zone
task.tooltip: Click here, then select a time region on a seismogram by holding down the mouse a dragging over the region of interest, tagged region will pop up in a separate display

task.name: Tag Particle Motion Zone
task.tooltip: Click here, then select a time region on a seismogram by holding down the mouse a dragging over the region of interest, tagged 3-component seismograms will pop up in a separate display

task.name: Choose Time relative to your Earthquake (SCEPP)
Choose Time relative to your Earthquake (DMC)
Choose Time relative to your Earthquake (DMC)

taskconfig.name: Web Connection to public Web site:

task.name: Intro to the Global Earthquake Explorer
Overlay Travel Times
task.tooltip: Click here to overlay predicted arrival times on your displayed seismograms

task.name: Event/Station Info
task.tooltip: Click here to display detailed information about your earthquake(s) and stations

task.name: Network/Station Info
task.tooltip: Click here to display detailed information about your network(s) and stations

task.name: Filter
task.tooltip: Click here to display seismogram filter palette
